page.title: 12CHURCHES
page.content:
{CHURCHES}
All saints church is on the left as you go in to Trefonen,the vicar at present is the rev Peter Gledhill.Holy communion is held at 9.30 until 10.30 on Sundays,with evensong at 6.30 till 7.30.The church yard is closed but a garden of remberance has been laid.The new cementry is half a mile nearer to Oswestry.The united reformed church is in chapel lane which is opposite all saints church.At present it is without a minister.One service is held each Sunday at 10.30 or in the evening at 6.00.The Welsh church is on the road through the old village.There is one service in Welsh each Sunday at 2.00 p.m.A Methodist church at Treflach is open when a visiting minister comes to take the services.
